methods.name: ToPublicInfoResponseModel
methods.code:
{
        if (userModel is null) return null;

        return new PublicInfoResponseModel(
            pseudo: userModel.Name.Pseudo,
            civility: userModel.Name.Civility?.Value,
            firstName: userModel.Name.FirstName,
            lastName: userModel.Name.LastName,
            birthName: userModel.Name.BirthName,
            aboutMe: userModel.BasicInfo.AboutMe,
            linkedInUrl: userModel.BasicInfo.LinkedInUrl.Uri?.AbsoluteUri,
            doesAppearInRanking: userModel.UserSchoolOptionsLoaded() ? userModel.UserSchoolOptions.DoesAppearInRanking : null,
            doesAppearInLearnerDirectory: userModel.UserSchoolOptionsLoaded() ? userModel.UserSchoolOptions.DoesAppearInLearnerDirectory : null,
            isOpenToCollaboration: userModel.UserSchoolOptionsLoaded() ? userModel.UserSchoolOptions.IsOpenToCollaboration : null,
            backgroundPictureUrl: userModel.BasicInfo.BackgroundPictureUrl,
            profilePictureUrl: userModel.BasicInfo.ProfilePictureUrl,
            professionalExperiences: userModel.ProfessionalExperiences.ToResponseModel(),
            trainings: userModel.TrainingsLoaded() ? userModel.Trainings.ToTrainingResponseModel() : new List<TrainingResponseModel>(),
            scores: userModel.UserScoresLoaded() ? userModel.UserScores?.ToResponseModel() : null,
            study: userModel.StudiesLoaded() ? userModel.Studies?.LastOrDefault()?.ToResponseModel() : null
        );
    }
methods.generated_summary: Create a response model containing public information based on the provided user model data.

params_list.name: UserModel
params_list.param_desc: The user model data that serves as the input to generate the public information response model.

params_list.name: userModel
params_list.param_desc: The user model data that serves as the input to generate the public information response model.

methods.name: ToResponseModel
methods.code:
{
        return professionalExperiences.Select((professionalExperience, index) => new ProfessionalExperienceResponseModel(
            id: professionalExperience.Id!.Value,
            position: professionalExperience.Position ?? string.Empty,
            companyName: professionalExperience.Company?.Name ?? string.Empty,
            contractType: new ContractTypeForProfessionalExperienceResponseModel(
                professionalExperience.ContractType.Code, professionalExperience.ContractType.Name!),
            activityArea: professionalExperience.ActivityArea?.Name ?? string.Empty,
            dateEntry: professionalExperience.DateEntry.Date,
            dateRelease: professionalExperience.DateRelease?.Date,
            durationInMonths: professionalExperience.DurationInMonths,
            isCurrent: professionalExperience.IsCurrent,
            order: index + 1));
    }
methods.generated_summary: Create a response model for a list of professional experiences including relevant details such as position, company name, contract type, activity area, dates, duration, and order.

params_list.name: professionalExperiences
params_list.param_desc: The list of professional experiences of type IEnumerable<ProfessionalExperienceModel>. This parameter contains professional experience data including details such as position, company name, contract type, activity area, dates, duration, and order.

params_list.name: ToResponseModel
params_list.param_desc: The method named ToResponseModel is responsible for creating a response model for a list of professional experiences. It generates a structured model that includes relevant details of each professional experience such as position, company name, contract type, activity area, dates, duration, and order.

methods.name: ToResponseModel
methods.code:
{
        return new ConvocationResponseModel()
        {
            Id = convocation.Id,
            UserId = convocation.UserId,
            SchoolId = convocation.SchoolId,
            PromotionId = convocation.PromotionId,
            CourseName = convocation.CourseName,
            LastName = convocation.LastName,
            MaidenName = convocation.MaidenName,
            FirstName = convocation.FirstName,
            BirthDate = convocation.BirthDate,
            BirthCity = convocation.BirthCity,
            BirthCountryId = convocation.BirthCountryId,
            NationalityId = convocation.NationalityId,
            HasRQTH = convocation.HasRQTH,
            TimezoneId = convocation.TimezoneId,
            ExamsSummonAddressId = convocation.ExamsSummonAddressId,
            NotificationDate = convocation.NotificationDate,
            DownloadDate = convocation.DownloadDate
        };
    }
